content: I like the idea of creating a retro-themed display that incorporates both my camera and vinyl records. I think I'll use a black and silver color scheme to give it a sleek, nostalgic look. I'll place my Contax T2 point-and-shoot camera on a small pedestal, surrounded by a selection of my favorite vinyl records. I'll add some decorative elements like vintage camera lenses, guitar picks, and music-themed posters to tie the display together. Can you give me some suggestions on how to choose the right vinyl records to display alongside my camera?
